Subject: Urgent: Suspicious Login Attempt Detected on Your Microsoft Account

Dear Valued Microsoft User,

We regret to inform you that our security systems have detected a suspicious login attempt on your Microsoft account. This login was attempted from an unrecognized device in a location outside of your usual location.

To ensure the security of your account, we kindly ask you to confirm whether this login attempt was made by you or if you suspect unauthorized access to your account. Please click on the link below to verify your identity and secure your account:

[Malicious Link]

Failure to confirm this login attempt within the next 24 hours may result in the temporary suspension of your account for security reasons. We take the security of our users very seriously and we appreciate your prompt attention to this matter.

Thank you for your cooperation in helping us maintain the security of your Microsoft account.

Sincerely,
Microsoft Security Team
